onClick.content: function(track,f) {var wburl = 'http://staging.wormbase.org'; var name = f.get('Name'); return 'This url results in a 404 how does it work for GBrowse? '+ wburl+'/get?name='+name;}
onClick.label: Feature in WormBase Staging
onClick.title: Feature in WormBase Staging

metadata.citation: These are transposon spans reviewed by WormBase curators.
